articles.description: The 37-year-old has failed to perform in the three innings he got a chance to bat in the showpiece event so far.
articles.content: Dinesh Karthik is yet to play any impactful innings in the ongoing T20 World Cup. The veteran wicket-keeper batter failed to contribute with the bat in this World Cup and all his three scores are in … [+1485 chars]

articles.author: Firdose Moonda
articles.title: Petersen hurts hamstring during CSA T20 Challenge final, could be doubtful for Australia tour - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He was stretchered off the field after hurting himself in the field
articles.content: Keegan Petersen had a poor tour of England, scoring only 122 runs in five innings  •  AFP/Getty Images

articles.author: Nick Friedell
articles.title: Nike suspends relationship with Kyrie Irving; Kyrie 8 launch off - ESPN India
articles.description: Nike's decision to suspend its relationship with Kyrie Irving comes one day after the Nets suspended him for "no less than five games" for failing to apologize for his controversial social-media posts.
articles.content: WASHINGTON -- Nike has suspended its relationship with Brooklyn Nets star Kyrie Irving in the wake of the controversy surrounding his social media post about a book and movie containing antisemitic t… [+1407 chars]
